attributes.action: INVEST MORE MONEY INTO ADVANCED RADIOTHERAPY EQUIPMENT.
attributes.additional_details: The Government to tackle the backlog, and catch new sufferers in the early onset, of cancer. Address cancer treatment capacity and consider spending more money on advanced radiotherapy. Train more staff to use the equipment and ensure that it is equally dispersed around all regions of the UK.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Ensure access to treatment and screening for all cancer patients during COVID-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603596

Invest urgently in the NHS cancer workforce in the autumn Spending Review: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596566

We could accept a petition specifically about increasing funding for radiotherapy equipment, but your petition appeared to want the Government to take wider action than just this.
